nodes.speaker: Narrator
nodes.text: A close friend starts spending time with someone else and you feel left behind.

nodes.speaker: Player
nodes.text: Do I talk to them or keep quiet?

choices.text: Tell them how you feel honestly.
Act jealous and try to prove you're better.
Find new friends and broaden your circle.

nodes.speaker: Narrator
nodes.text: They appreciate your honesty; you talk and understand each other better.

nodes.speaker: Narrator
nodes.text: The drama causes more distance. You feel worse and realize the cost of acting out.

nodes.speaker: Narrator
nodes.text: You meet others with shared interests. You feel lighter meeting new people.

nodes.speaker: Player
nodes.text: Friendship changes. Saying what I feel matters, but so does finding people who match who I am.
